description:
Curator's Note: I have restored the module download feature, and have begun enabling a decent selection of Bible versions. I've also removed the Metrix app tracking functionality since it didn't work anyway. This version works great on phones; for tablets, check out BibleZ HD.

BibleZ is an very easy to use and full-featured bible app for webOS. Features are:
fulltext search || Bookmarks || own study notes || highlighting verses || share your favorite scriptures (eMail, SMS) || fullscreen mode with bigger font-size || bible passage history || multilingual interface (german/english) || many bible modules in many languages (currently 58)
If you have installing, updating or general problems with BibleZ please contact us: info@zefanjas.de
versionNote: Added NIV, all rights belong to their rights holders. Please make sure you own a copy of NIV before using.
